item.title: How do i get a certain borrows npc to drop that barrow
item.dc:creator: @eekz eekz
item.description:
@eekz wrote:

ok here i go into ure item.3 and search

public static int fishminigame[] = {379,385,333,373}; public static int randomfishminigame() { return fishminigame[(int)(Math.random()*fishminigame.length)]; }
and under add this

public static int urename[] = {item id}; public static int urename() { return urename[(int)(Math.random()*urename.length)]; }

then open ure npc handler

and searh for this

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 396) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomfishminigame(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }
and under add this

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == npcid) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.urename(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

and make sure you change the ure name to the whatever you want

Read full topic
